FEATURES

1. Favorite & Manage Games - Mark games as favorites and organize them within a personalized collection.
2. One-Click Game Launch - Instantly launch your favorite Stickman games directly from the extension.
3. Quick Access to Top Games - Access a curated selection of popular Stickman games without searching multiple sites.
4. MAGBEI Logo - Links directly to Magbei.com for easy access to the main site.
5. "Discover More Spooky Games on Magbei" Banner - Links to the full Stickman games collection on Magbei.com/stickman-games/.
6. Offline Image Caching - Enjoy faster loading times with images cached locally for easy offline access.
7. Dynamic Game Library - Discover new games with the Pagination bar option, which expands your collection.
8. Seamless Navigation - Switch easily between favorite games and the main game collection using built-in pagination.
9. Automatic Updates - Stay up-to-date with the latest games, as the extension automatically fetches new posts every 15 minutes.

IMPORTANT

Stickman games are incredibly versatile, so here's a breakdown of the genres they belong to:

Action games: This is the heart and soul of Stickman games. Think fast-paced combat, platforming challenges, and intense brawls. Popular subgenres include:

Fighting games: Hand-to-hand battles with combos and cool moves.
Platformer: Skill and timing are key as you navigate tricky levels.
Shooter: Gunplay with Stickman flair ‚Äì simple but satisfying (Shooting Games)
Puzzle: Stickman games often ask you to think creatively to overcome obstacles. These can range from simple physics puzzles to elaborate escape-room scenarios.

Sports:  A surprisingly popular genre for Stickman games.  From stick figure soccer to archery, they offer a fun twist on traditional sports games.

RPG (Role-Playing Game): Some Stickman games let you level up characters, upgrade gear, and delve into narratives.

Casual: A category including everything from simple time-wasters to comedic and quirky experiences. Stickman themes fit well with this relaxed type of gaming.

Important Note: Stickman games aren't confined to specific genres ‚Äì the defining feature is the stick figure aesthetic.  You could find Stickman games blended with other genres like:

Racing
Strategy
Simulation games...
